Key Match Events: Garry Rodrigues scored a late goal to defeat Ghana 2-1
Jamiro Monteiro scored for Cape Verde early in the match
Alexander Djiku equalized for Ghana before halftime
A VAR check ruled Ghana's goal out for offside
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana coach Chris Hughton will need to pull out all the stops for the next game against Egypt
Ghana must revisit the drawing board after this shock defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde secured the top spot in Group B with three points
Ghana lacked the attacking penetration of Mohammed Kudus due to his injury
